Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP42.view.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelObserver, ViewObservable
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewObservable, ModelObserver

      public VirtualView​(java.util.ArrayList<ClientHandler> playingClients, int numberOfPlayers)
      Constructor to set VirtualView.
      Parameters:
      playingClients - number of player in game as ArrayList
      numberOfPlayers - number of player

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()

    • setCurrentPlayerID

      public void setCurrentPlayerID​(int currentPlayerID)

    • getChoice

      public Choice getChoice()
      Getter to obtain a player Choice. Every choice (move or build) made by a player is saved in a Choice object.
      Returns:
      choice

    • setActionCorrect

      public void setActionCorrect​(boolean value)
      This method is used to set the boolean attribute actionCorrect, which determines the end of an action done by the current player, so the GamePhase can move on.
      Parameters:
      value - true if action is correct, false otherwise

    • isUndoDone

      public boolean isUndoDone()

    • setUndoDone

      public void setUndoDone​(boolean value)

    • isPowerApply

      public boolean isPowerApply()

    • setPowerApply

      public void setPowerApply​(boolean value)
      This method is used to set the boolean attribute powerApply, which determines that the player is going to use the power.
      Parameters:
      value - true if player wants to apply the power, false otherwise

    • isInterrupted

      public boolean isInterrupted()

    • getPlayerData

      public java.util.ArrayList<UserData> getPlayerData​(java.lang.String[] set)
      Method that helps the Controller to ask for the players data during the creation of game. The method uses a utility class called UserData which contains {Nickname, GodCard}.
      Parameters:
      set - is an Array of string containing the set of Gods picked randomly, set.length = number of Players
      Returns:
      ArrayList player names given through System.in

    • getWorker

      public java.lang.Integer getWorker()
      Method used by the Controller to ask which worker to use during the turn.
      Returns:
      worker, 1 if its the worker1 , 2 if its the worker2 of the player

    • handleWelcomeMessage

      public void handleWelcomeMessage()
      Handle method used to send to all players welcome message.

    • noWriteForNotCurrentPlayers

      public void noWriteForNotCurrentPlayers​(java.lang.Integer currentPlayer)
      Method used to ignore input from not current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - current player id

    • handleInit

      public void handleInit()
      Handle method used to initialize the GameBoard by ControllerHandler.

    • handleInitialPosition

      public void handleInitialPosition()
      Handle method used to ask to user to insert coordinates for his 2 workers and notify observers to set this data.

    • handleWhatToDo

      public java.lang.String[][] handleWhatToDo​(java.lang.String s)
      Handle method that gives to view the information about all the action that a playerCard can perform.
      Parameters:
      s - player nickname
      Returns:
      array of String arrays with (START, PREMOVE, MOVE, PREBUILD, BUILD, END)

    • handleStart

      public java.lang.Integer handleStart()
      Handle method used to ask to choose one of the 2 available workers of currentPlayer.
      Returns:
      1 = worker1, 2 = worker2

    • handleMove

      public void handleMove​(java.lang.Integer worker)
      Handle method to notify observer that has to handle a move action from player.
      Parameters:
      worker - is an integer that tells which one of the two worker are selected by player

    • handleBuild

      public void handleBuild​(java.lang.Integer worker)
      Handle method to notify observer that has to handle a build action from player.
      Parameters:
      worker - is an integer that tells which one of the two worker are selected by player (its the same one called from the move action)

    • undoOption

      public boolean undoOption​(java.lang.String warning)
      Method used to show/manage Undo function accessible to the player. It has an internal timer and ask if the current player wants to apply Undo Option within 5 seconds.
      Parameters:
      warning - its a string that can be only (NOWARNING, WARNING) and tells the player that if he doesn't use undo function he will lose the game
      Returns:
      true if the undo is applied

    • handleEffect

      public void handleEffect()
      Handle method to notify the observers about an effect, that involves all players, has been applied (not move/build effect).

    • printEffect

      public void printEffect​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String effect)
      Method used to send to players that an effect started or ended.
      Parameters:
      s - start or end effect
      effect - effect type

    • handleEnd

      public void handleEnd()
      Handle method to notify to controller to change next currentPlayer.

    • handleWinner

      public void handleWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
      Handle method used to send to all players win message.
      Parameters:
      winner - player

    • handleLoser

      public void handleLoser​(java.lang.String loser)
      Used to send to all players lose message.
      Parameters:
      loser - player

    • handleInterrupt

      public void handleInterrupt()
      Handle method used to notify to controller the game interruption.

    • callPowerFunction

      public void callPowerFunction​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.Integer worker)
      Utility method to call the correct handle method.
      Parameters:
      s - String (MOVE, BUILD, EFFECT) that identify corresponding handle method to call
      worker - integer that identifies the worker who will do move/build action

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String string)
      Used to send to all players the update GameBoard after a player action.
      Specified by:
      updateBoard in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      object - GameBoard
      string - used to inform other players about the current player action

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • sendUserDataToPlayerInGame

      public void sendUserDataToPlayerInGame​(UserData data)
      Method used to send UserData to player in game. It is useful for clients to know other players data.

      data - UserData

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
